item.title: About
item.description: First and foremost: I’m introducing software ideas to the real world. And are keeping them running … Ever since I was a little kid, computers have been my passion. I still remember the first try to upgrade my PC, which entertained me with a firework-like show after turning on the power switch. Fortunately, a friend and I got away with just a broken power fuse. Currently, I’m leading local and international agile software engineering teams, which I built up from the ground at UMB to create time for our customers and us.
